main event: A Ground-Radar operator observed one object which appeared on the radar scope in Brooklyn, New York on July 22, 1961.
interesting points: The object was tracked for 3 minutes before disappearing from the radar scope., Further details on the object's detection and loss have been requested but not yet received., The operator suspect the sighting was caused by an electronic malfunction., The operator reported this as nothing like previous sightings, which were typically metallic and oblong., The report was communicated to Mr. T.H. Draper.
witness description: Ground-Radar operator, the only witness was identified as Mrs. Luc.
